AuraReading: âœ¨Aura Reading (Tarot + Clairsentience + Clairvoyance + Water Reading):

Your aura holds the secrets of your energy, your strength, and the influences affecting your life.
In this reading, I will scan your aura and reveal:

The colors and condition of your aura (Is it strong? Blocked? Balanced?) ğŸ¥šğŸ–¼ï¸

The energies currently influencing you (Are you carrying emotions, negativity, or past wounds from others?) ğŸ“¦

What needs to be done to clear it and strengthen your power ğŸ You will receive a detailed voice analysis of my findings, helping you better understand your energy and your current situation.
AuraReadingAndCleans:
ONLY 2â€“3 SLOTS PER MONTH FOR THIS TOPIC ğŸ´â€â˜ ï¸

Your aura is the energy you carry, the power surrounding youâ€”
and when it becomes polluted, blocked, or dim,
it affects everything: your luck, strength, and manifestation ability.
This session will uncover the truth about your aura
and show you how to cleanse what has been weighing you down.
FullAuraCleanseRitual:
A deep, intensive purification process to remove stagnation, negative attachments, and past energies that are holding you back.
This ritual includes:

A fire cleansing to dissolve negativity.
A smoke cleansing to release heavy, lingering energies.

A water blessing to seal protection
and restore the full strength of your aura.

_NiNa_
